description.value: Unsuspecting targets are especially vulnerable to your poisons. When you successfully Strike a flat-footed creature with a poisoned weapon or expose a @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} creature to an inhaled poison, the flat-footed condition also gives that creature a -2 circumstance penalty to its initial save against that poison.
